overview: THE SURGE AT MOUNT SINAI tracks three healthcare workers, two intimate patient journeys and experts from across the hospital in one of the worldâ€™s largest healthcare systems in the country during an unprecedented global pandemic. With intimate access to those on the front lines, the film chronicles the race against time as New York City became the global epicenter of the Covid-19 outbreak and New York was experiencing more than 350 deaths per day.
title: The Surge at Mount Sinai
